description_for_human: Plugin for playing a game of Tic Tac Toe. You can submit your move and get the AI's response move.
description_for_model: This Tic Tac Toe API allows you to play a game of Tic Tac Toe against an AI. You interact with the API by sending your moves and receiving the AI's response move. The game board is represented as a single array, and both the input and output are JSON formatted. The API endpoint is `POST https://api.ludum.dev/v1/tictactoe`, and it provides the updated state of the game after each move.
